title: [Large-scale] Developing Physical Education Teachers' Athletic Skill Instructional Competence: Collaborative Professional Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Physical Education Theories and Practical Skills Experience
context.additional_context: Program for preservice physical education teachers emphasizing competency in designing and implementing motor skill education. Focus on developing professional expertise applicable to real classroom contexts through team-based collaborative learning

learning_goals: Can analyze and improve their physical education lesson designs through collaborative feedback processes
Can apply diverse teaching strategies for motor skill development in actual classroom settings
Can evaluate instructional effectiveness and develop follow-up action plans based on student learning outcome data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
